IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: YOUTH FOR TOMORROW FOUNDATION WAS ESTABLISHED EXCLUSIVELY FOR CHARITABLE, SCIENTIFIC AND EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES BY PROVIDING GUIDANCE, SERVICES, AND SUPPORT EXCLUSIVELY DEDICATED TO THE CHARITABLE MISSION OF YFT-THE AIDING AND OFFERING CHILDREN IN CRISIS WITH A QUALITY EDUCATION, RE-DIRECTION OF THEIR PERSONAL BEHAVIOR, STRENGTHENING THEIR MENTAL AND PHYSICAL FIRNESS, ENHANCING THEIR SPIRITUAL COMMITMENT, AND REUNITING CHILDREN WITH THEIR FAMILIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: YOUTH FOR TOMORROW FOUNDATION WAS ESTABLISHED EXCLUSIVELY FOR CHARITABLE, SCIENTIFIC AND EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES BY PROVIDING GUIDANCE, SERVICES, AND SUPPORT EXCLUSIVELY DEDICATED TO THE CHARITABLE MISSION OF YFT-THE AIDING AND OFFERING CHILDREN IN CRISIS WITH A QUALITY EDUCATION, RE-DIRECTION OF THEIR PERSONAL BEHAVIOR, STRENGTHENING THEIR MENTAL AND PHYSICAL FITNESS, ENHANCING THEIR SPIRITUAL COMMITMENT, AND REUNITING CHILDREN WITH THEIR FAMILIES.
IRS990.Desc: SUPPORT YFT BY PROVIDING GUIDANCE, SERVICES, AND SUPPORT EXCLUSIVELY DEDICATED TO THE CHARITABLE MISSION OF YFT.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: DR GARY L JONES SEE SCH J

SupportedOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: YOUTH FOR TOMORROW - NEW LIFE CENTER INC

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: DURING THE TAX YEAR THE FOUNDATION USED SUBSTANTIALLY ALL ITS RESOURCES TO SUPPORT YOUTH FOR TOMORROW - NEW LIFE CENTER, INC. BY MAKING CONTRIBUTION PLEDGES (AND MAKING PAYMENTS ON THOSE PLEDGES AS CASH AS AVAILABLE) TO ASSIST YOUTH FOR TOMORROW - NEW LIFE CENTER, INC. IN FULFILLING ITS EXEMPT PURPOSE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION APPLIES THE ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES GUIDANCE, FASB CODIFICATION TOPIC 740, "ACCOUNTING FOR INCOME TAXES". THE ACCOUNTING GUIDANCE PRESCRIBES A RECOGNITION THRESHOLD AND MEASUREMENT ATTRIBUTE FOR FINANCIAL STATEMENT RECOGNITION AND MEASUREMENT OF A TAX POSITION TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN A TAX RETURN AND ALSO PROVIDES GUIDANCE ON VARIOUS RELATED MATTERS SUCH AS DERECOGNITION, INTEREST, PENALTIES AND DISCLOSURES REQUIRED. THE FOUNDATION RECOGNIZES INTEREST AND PENALTIES, IF ANY, RELATED TO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS IN THE APPLICABLE OPERATING EXPENSE ACCOUNT. THE FOUNDATION HAS NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS OF JUNE 30, 2022 AND 2021. THERE WAS NO UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME FOR THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30,2022 AND 2021. FEDERAL AND STATE TAX RETURNS FOR FISCAL YEARS ENDED 2023, 2022, 2021 AND 2020 REMAIN OPEN AND ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES.

RltdOrgOfficerTrstKeyEmplGrp.PersonNm: DR GARY L JONES SEE SCH J

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCE COMMITTEE AND AUDIT COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE FORM 990 AND THEN THE ORGANIZATION FORWARDS A COPY TO ALL MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY BEFORE FILING THE FORM 990.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CEO IS THE MAIN MONITOR FOR CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY COMPLIANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND/OR THAT PORTION OF THE TAX RETURN THAT IS OPEN TO PUBLIC INSPECTION ARE AVAILABLE VIA WRITTEN REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND/OR THAT PORTION OF THE TAX RETURN THAT IS OPEN TO PUBLIC INSPECTION ARE AVAILABLE VIA WRITTEN REQUEST.

THE AUDIT COMMITTEE HAS THE RESPONSIBILITY TO APPOINT, COMPENSATE AND OVERSEE THE INDEPENDENT AUDITORS RETAINED BY THE ORGANIZATION AND PRE-APPROVE ALL AUDIT SERVICES PROVIDED BY THE INDEPENDENT AUDITOR. THEY ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR REVIEWING AND APPROVING THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND PRESENTING THEM TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND FINALLY THE GOVERNING BODY FOR ACCEPTANCE.
